mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id AS courseId, c.course_name AS courseName, t.staff_id AS staffId, t.name AS teacherName, cs.total_score AS grade, c.credit FROM course_selection cs INNER JOIN teacher t ON cs.staff_id = t.staff_id INNER JOIN course c ON cs.course_id = c.course_id WHERE cs.student_id = #{studentId} AND cs.semester = #{semester}
